text: Carla's Song is a 1996 British German Spanish drama movie directed by Ken Loach and starring Scott Glenn, Robert Carlyle, Gary Lewis. It was narrated by Stephen Fry and was nominated for a BAFTA Award in 1997. ==Other websites== * * Category:1996 drama movies Category:British drama movies Category:German drama movies Category:Spanish drama movies Category:Movies directed by Ken Loach Category:Movies set in Scotland Category:Movies set in the 1980s
title: Carla's Song
